descriptionHtml:
Aurora+TSO is a mod including:
1. A new quest \"Aurora\'s Secrets\". Quest is fully sounded and only Russian version for now;
2. New uniqe NPCs (You can set Aurora as a follower, then you can marry her). One of the goals of the mod is to enhance wife function, so attention: erotic content;
3. New items by other authors. I added them upon permissions of the authors to provide the conception of my mod;
4. TSO (Transport System Overhaul) - changes of gameplay to substitute Fast Travel for teleportation and horse usage.
***************************************
If you know Russian go to files and download \"russian readme\" if you don\'t you can anyway try this mod or even localize it! It would be great.
***************************************
\"Aurora\'s Secrets\":
Is a quest achiving two goals: to give you teleportation spells and introduce teleportation into Skyrim; to let you marry the best maid in Skyrim Aurora - she knows how to please a tired warrior. Teleportation is now Mark and Recall By Pcuser(Qowy). In future I plan to develop teleportation system by adding new spells.
To start the quest find Aurora in Solitude or around.
Oh! By the way I fixed the problem with followers hunting bow, so with my mod you can give them any bows and arrows you want and they will use your weapon! 

\"TSO\":
is an optional file to change gameplay according to the telepotation presence:
horses 40% faster in any mode of ride
they are cowardly
walking is 40% faster
I plan to disable fast travel in an appropriate way as soon as I know how.

Installation:
Put files to Data folder. TSO is optional, you can leave it if you dont need gameplay changes.
I strongly recommend that you have version 1.4.21 or above for this mod to work properly 

Don\'t forget to endorse if you like it. It took me realy much time and powers :) 

Thanks to great modders:
1. Qowy http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8088
2. Ashara http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5577
3. reaper9111 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5864
4. Isilmeriel http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727
5. DoODABoOM http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7109
6. Caliente http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
7. PROMETHEUS_ts http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2822
8. Fore http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11811
author: Sergeantik
